Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Filter bypass indicator activation. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Steering Control component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: D - Due to features inherent in the design
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
